    <h1>YOLO-v11 Fish Detector</h1>
    <div class="key-metrics">
      <p><strong>Precision:</strong> 0.885</p>

<div class="content">
  <div class="overview">
    <h2>Overview</h2>
    <p>This model detects fish in underwater images. It spots about 9 out of every 10 fish and rarely mistakes coral or rocks for fish. Adjust the confidence slider to reduce false positives (but you might miss a few shy fish).</p>
  </div>

  <div class="details">
    <h2>Model Details</h2>
    <ul>
      <li><strong>Architecture:</strong> YOLO-v11 (custom)</li>
      <li><strong>Input Size:</strong> 640x640</li>
      <li><strong>Training Schedule:</strong> 100 epochs, batch size 32</li>
    </ul>
  </div>

  <div class="performance">
    <h2>Performance</h2>
    <img src="example_PR_curve.png" alt="PR Curve" class="pr-curve">
  </div>

  <div class="usage">
    <h2>Usage Example</h2>
    <pre><code>from fish_detector import FishDetector
model = FishDetector('yolov11-fish.pt')
results = model.detect('underwater_photo.jpg', conf=0.25)
results.show()</code></pre>
  </div>
